page.title: 16Interviewing Mrs Anstee
page.content: Claire and I went to interview Mrs Anstee, Claire's Gran. She said that she did not go to Stanton School, she went to{Grittleton,}and the{teachers that she had were Mrs Amos, Mr Amos, Mrs Archard, Miss Morris and Mrs Alexander. She said that she wore a dress with a pinafore and lace short stockings. They played{games}like Marbles, Skipping, Singing Games, Whiptop, Hoop, London and other games. We asked her how long she had lived here and she said since 1945, and she said that Mr Anstee has lived here all his life. She{worked}at the Great House. Then we asked her whether the village has changed a lot, and much has been added. She liked the village now better than before. She didn't have any evacuees in the{second world {war.}Her children came to Stanton school, also her grandchildren.
